page.title: 06RECREATION
page.content: {1.RIVER VILLAGE HALL:}RIVER IS NOW AN AREA OF DOVER,ALTHOUGH IT USED TO BE A SEPARATE VILLAGE.THE LOCAL RESIDENTS TRY TO MAINTAIN SOME FACETS OF VILLAGE LIFE AND THE VILLAGE HALL PROVIDES A CENTRAL MEETING POINT FOR THE VARIOUS ORGANISATIONS.THESE INCLUDE;THE LOCAL AMATEUR DRAMATIC SOCIETY,THE RIVER GARDENERS AND THE WOMEN'S INSTITUTE. {2.ELM'S VALE RECREATION GROUND:}THIS LARGE,OPEN SPACE IS AN IMPORTANT FACILITY FOR THE ELM'S VALE AREA,BEING EXTENSIVELY USED BY ADULTS AND CHILDREN.THROUGHOUT THE WINTER MONTHS THE 5 FOOTBALL PITCHES ARE WIDELY USED BY LOCAL TEAMS AND SCHOOLS.IN THE SUMMER THERE ARE 3 CRICKET PITCHES.THERE ARE ALSO 2 TENNIS COURTS AND A NETBALL PITCH.THERE IS A CHILDREN'S PLAY AREA AND AN AVIARY.
